name: PCCompat
author: Strencher
description: Allows you to load powerCord plugins within Kernel.

changelog.title: Changelogs
items: We try to keep changelogs updated now.

changelog.title: Improved settings
items: We improved how settings panels are handled so you won't have 10000 tabs and instead you have them now accessible via the settings button on plugin cards!

changelog.title: More API's
items: A lot of powercord's api's have been rewritten and ready to use for plugins now!
In case you experience bugs, please let us know inside the #package-support channel or via github issue.

changelog.title: QuickCSS
items: A lot people have been asking for it, PCCompat has a QuickCSS editor now! Go check it out in the settings
